name: A Hero's Advantage
description:
This project is apart of a challenge to create a game for each letter of the alphabet. Check out the source code if you are interested.

You are a newly appointed Deity and have to grant Boons to your Hero subjects. Only problem is, you don't really know what they are good against or the monsters they are going up against. Experiment and learn about the Boons, Enemies and Heros to give them a fighting change.

Controls

You'll only need keyboard for entering a in-game name. Majority of the game like clicking around.
